dct_description_sm: Date from pencil mark on cover and map code: "29-4-22"--lower right.; Relief shown by hachures and spot heights.; Includes distance charts.; Insets with statistical information: Colombo -- Trincomalee -- Batticaloa -- Badula -- Nuwara Eliya -- Hambantota -- Tangalle -- Matara -- Galle -- Ratnapura -- Kalutara -- Kegalle -- Negombo -- Kurunegala -- Kandy -- Chilaw -- Puttalam -- Anuradhapura -- Mannar -- Jaffna -- Mullaittivu.
89 x 56 centimeters, folded to 19 x 11 centimeters
